text: Shivers (, Dreszcze) is a 1981 Polish drama movie directed by Wojciech Marczewski and starring Tomasz Hudziec, Teresa Marczewska, Marek Kondrat, Jerzy Bi≈Ñczycki, Ryszard Kotys. ==Other websites== * Category:1981 drama movies Category:Polish drama movies Category:Movies directed by Wojciech Marczewski
